title: Boost fails to build on Cray
body:
I tried `spack install boost %gcc@7.1.0`. I have no idea, why the output mentions `netcdf`. I did try to install the netcdf (which also failed, #6861), but it should be irrelevant.

The error message is very long and repetitive, I cut most part of it.

```
[adamr@daint103:~/propoze/tests/build] develop ± spack install boost %gcc@7.1.0
==> bzip2 is already installed in /users/adamr/tmp/spack/opt/spack/cray-CNL-haswell/gcc-7.1.0/bzip2-1.0.6-wunq73zwexjyvnsrycs3qqqt3dywwsxy
==> zlib is already installed in /users/adamr/tmp/spack/opt/spack/cray-CNL-haswell/gcc-7.1.0/zlib-1.2.11-rddvlwt5l2jfhyii7cph5byydf2hr2mh
```
